Introduction

TouchSky is a "3D oriented" R&D application for astronomy based on our softinex technology. It emphasizes the native portability on most devices we have today, including macOS, Windows, Linux for laptops/desktops, but also iOS and Android for smartphones and tablets, and since the 2.x vesions, being able to run in most web browsers by using the WebAssembly technology.

See demos on YouTube by searching "Barrand TouchSky".
